function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poorer housing conditions with higher incidences of overcrowding","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to close proximity and limited ventilation","Mitigation":"Improving housing conditions, reducing overcrowding, and ensuring better ventilation","Technologies":"Air purification systems, smart building designs, and monitoring tools","People":"Residents of overcrowded housing, particularly in urban areas","Owner":"Local governments, housing authorities, and urban planners"},{"Description":"Higher dependency on public transport","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to contagious diseases during transit","Mitigation":"Promoting alternative transportation methods, improving ventilation and sanitization on public transport, and reducing overcrowding","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, ventilation systems, and real-time occupancy monitoring","People":"Commuters who rely on public transport","Owner":"Transport authorities, city planners, and transit operators"},{"Description":"Living in areas with higher population density","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread due to close proximity and limited physical distancing","Mitigation":"Urban planning to optimize space, create green areas, and promote physical distancing measures","Technologies":"Smart city infrastructure, urban mobility solutions, and spatial analytics","People":"Residents of densely populated areas and urban centers","Owner":"Urban planners, local governments, and community organizations"}]}
